# Counting experiment with multiple channels for mass point: 500
imax 6
jmax *
kmax *
----------------------------------
Channels and observed events
bin mumueq0jets mumueq1jets mumugeq2jets eeeq0jets eeeq1jets eegeq2jets 
observation 2.0 1.0 1.0 2.0 2.0 1.0 
-----------------------------------
# now we list the expected events for signal and all backgrounds in the different bins
# processes are signaled as follows: 0 = signal, >0 = backgrounds
# rates are normalized to an hypothetical cross section in units of pb
# absolute limits will be given in units of pb
# follow independent sources of uncertainties and their effect (syst.error) for each process and category
